title: Aleksandr Solop
text:
Aleksandr Vasilyevich Solop (; born 23 June 1971) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20First%20League">Soviet First League</a> in 1991 for <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
